description:
One spring day, Miyauchi Renge plays her recorder as she makes her way to school earlier than usual. The students have music class today, and they`ll be performing together. She tells a high school student riding her bus, Fujimiya Konomi, that she`s having trouble playing the "do" note, and they agree to practice together sometime soon. Renge arrives at Asahigaoka Branch School, and the other students soon follow...
Source: crunchyroll
